mapper.select:
SELECT count(u.UserCode) FROM sys_object_user u JOIN sys_object_user_basegroup bg ON u.UserCode = bg.UserCode AND JobType = 'Origin' JOIN sys_object_domain d on bg.Companycode = d.domainCode WHERE u.IsUse ='Y' AND u.IsDisplay='Y' AND u.ACCOUT_LOCK='Y' AND d.DomainID = #{DomainID}
AND u.MultiDisplayName like '%'||#{searchText}||'%'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_object_user_lock_history (UserCode, ApprovalRemark, Result, RegisterCode , RegistDate, RegistIP, DomainID) VALUES(#{UserCode}, #{ApprovalRemark}, #{Result}, #{USERID}, SYSDATE, #{USERIP}, #{DN_ID})
mapper.select: /* userlock.getUserLockHistory */ SELECT TO_CHAR( h.RegistDate,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS "RegistDate", ApprovalRemark AS "ApprovalRemark", Result AS "Result" , Fn_BaseGetDictionary_S(#{lang}, u.MultiDisplayName) AS "DisplayName", u.UserCode AS "UserCode" FROM sys_object_user_lock_history h LEFT JOIN sys_object_user u on h.RegisterCode = u.UserCode WHERE h.UserCode =#{UserCode} ORDER BY h.RegistDate DESC
